game.name: NEON SPEED
game.shortDescription: NEON SPEED is a casual racing game.You need to ride on a high speed between another cars on the road and earn points to improve your car later.You can choose the best car that will absolutely fits you!
game.shortDescriptionEn: NEON SPEED is a casual racing game.You need to ride on a high speed between another cars on the road and earn points to improve your car later.You can choose the best car that will absolutely fits you!

reviewHighlights.text: Neon Speed is a compact, arcade-style racing experience that wears its simplicity proudly, delivering a straightforward loop built around speed, refle...
